channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ozempic may help manage opioid addiction: study
item.description: Patients on semaglutide were less than half as likely to overdose as those on insulin.

item.title: We keep celebrating low unemploymentâ€”but data shows jobs and economic activity have been shifting to big business
item.description: A one-size-fits-all approach has dominated economic policy and has favored bigger, more established, and less dynamic businesses.

item.title: Account suspensions have tripled on X since Elon Musk took over
item.description: First transparency report since 2022 shows scope of change.

item.title: Infowars is going on the auction block
item.description: Proceeds will go toward paying what Alex Jones owes relatives of victims of the Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting.

item.title: Stanley teams up with Barbie for the next giant mug obsession
